properties.details: empowers slum girls and young women to lead a self-determined life. Its main instruments of empowerment are education, skills development, and sound health. It equips girls who have ever been involved in commercial sex with skills in videography, computer skills and also educates them on reproductive health.
properties.projects_names: IDI KCCA Project,Scream Project, Education and scholarship project, Bengo project

properties.name_organisation: Action Group for Health, Human Rights and HIV/AIDS
properties.details: Mobilizes health professionals and health consumers to address issues of human rights as they relate to health, with a specific focus on HIV/AIDS.
